text: Naryury Alexandra Pérez Reveron (born 29 September 1992) is a Venezuelan weightlifter who competes in the +75 kg division. She won bronze medals at the 2013 and 2014 Pan American Championships and a silver medal at the 2015 Pan American Games. She failed all clean and jerk attempts at the 2016 Olympics and hence did not finish.
